Yes, you're absolutely right. Plate tectonics helps us understand the source of these natural disasters and how they shape our planet. Although humans have no control over these tremendous forces of nature, we can take steps to reduce the risks associated with them. With advanced technology, we now have better monitoring systems, early warning systems, and emergency response plans in place to help mitigate the impact of these events. 

It's essential for us to continue to invest in research, technology, and infrastructure to prepare ourselves for future tectonic events. By doing so, we can help to save lives and minimize the damage caused by these natural disasters.
